title: What to Read This Week
sub_head: The women who guided a powerful British clan; Shirley Jackson’s family circus; a moment of truth in divided Berlin; a tale of paternal vengeance and  more.
body:
The British clan that provided soldiers to fight wars across the ocean also raised female diplomats who worked behind the scenes. Review by Stephen Brumwell
Read the review
Her stories and novels are haunted, but Shirley Jackson’s letters crackle with life. Review by Sam Sacks
Read the review
